properties.verseOrder: v1 v2 v3 v4 v5 v6 v7 v8 v9 v10

verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}You are Holy (echo) You are Mighty (echo) You are Worthy (echo) Worthy of Praise (echo) I will listen (echo) I will follow (echo) I will love You (echo) All of my days (echo){/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: I will sing to and worship Sisters: He is the Lord of Lords; He is the King of Kings{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: The King who worthy Sisters: He is the Mighty God; Lord of everything{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: I will love and adore Him Sisters: He is Emmanuel; He is the Great I Am{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v5
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: I will bow down before Him Sisters: He is my Prince of Peace Who is the Lamb{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v6
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: I will sing to and worship Sisters: He is the Living God; He is the Saving Grace{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v7
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: The King Who is Worthy Sisters: He will reign forever; He’s the Ancient of Days{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v8
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: I will love and adore Him Sisters: He’s the Alpha, Omega, Beginning, and End{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v9
verse.lines: {lang-eng}Brothers: I will bow down before Him Sisters: He’s my Savior, Messiah, Redeemer, and Friend 10. All: He is my Prince of Peace and I will live my life for Him. He is my Prince of Peace and I will live my life for Him.{/lang-eng}
